title: sama nilaiyil
sahitya:
sama nilaiyil irundu viTTAl calanam En manamE enrum


anupallavi

  amaidiyAna sAkSiyAga arivukkuLLE arivanAgi
imaigaL pOlE iru vinaiyai eNNi inba tunbaminri


caraNam 1    inru pOnAl nALai uNDu iravu pOnAl paghaum uNDu 
veTriyuNDu tOlvi illai visanap-poyyai veTTi erindu
    caraNam 2    ponrum uDalil enrum uLLa poruLaip paTri aruLaik-kUDi
onrupaTTu mUnru viTTu nAngum aindum ezhundEra
